ygData.subject: Re: Welp... it was me :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually bards got a new song. It s like 20 hp regen and adds ac. Still though bards got a nice round of songs can you think of many that would keep balance
ygData.messageBody:
Actually bards got a new song. It's like 20 hp regen and adds ac. Still
though bards got a nice round of songs can you think of many that would keep
balance in?

One thing though that really pissed me of this patch was that my level 50
dark elf necromancer is kos in Paineel the necro city! Heck you think I
would at leats be dubious. I got my faction to dubious by killing guards but
it maxed out there. I seriously hope somebody finds a way to get warmly
because I want to be able to enter the necro city.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Burke <tjohnburke@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, February 18, 2000 1:40 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Welp... it was me :)


>From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>
>
>I was the bard who spoke up, said my piece after the patch. Abashi seemed
to be quite pissie in his response, but I can understand that.
>
>I tell ya all this... I don't care if it's different people working on
equipment, and if they got another song in. We are still missing 3 songs,
and should not settle. Why bards are a lower priority than other classes, I
don't know.
>
>On the good foot, tried the invis song, and it worked...
>
>Tried the area affect songs... Largos almost got me killed in lguk...
pulled 2 outta 3 froggies off a pally & ranger, I am assuming they were
laying on the taunt button...
>
>All in all... I think he was saying, if I don't like it, I can leave.
>
>Something about not being able to satisfy all the people.
>
>I dunno... just doesn't seem right to me
>
>Kerouac Dharmabum
>lvl 34 bard
>Rodcent Nife
>
>
>
>
